title: Jhin Deadeye Realization
body:
My friend realized something while researching the Jhin/Deadeye story.
{{champion:238}} 3 letters Z.E.D
{{champion:37}}  4 Letters S.O.N.A
{{champion:86}}  5 Letters G.A.R.E.N
{{champion:254}} 
"But wait, Vi only has two letters you idiot!"
Look again.
Vi is for VI in roman numerals which stands for WHAT NUMBERS?
That's right.
{{champion:254}} The number 6




How this ties into the story of Jhin/Deadeye I leave to you.
Live long and worship {{item:3512}}

Told you your thread will be removed ;)
vi is 6, and 2, so the order is 2-6 missing 1, so add it at the end you get 7.

I just can't believe we're getting a second sniper champion.

CertainlyT, you nailed the Cait rework! Nailed it! League has a champion who absolutely feels like a trained sniper. Why do we need another one?
You don't even know that it's a sniper champion yet... Patience man.

> [{quoted}](name=FreezeDragon105,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iXTRtMpl,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-12-31T03:22:48.714+0000)
>
> You don't even know that it's a sniper champion yet... Patience man.

1) Sound of a gunshot.

2) Champions being pierced in very specific parts of their body

3) Name is "Deadeye", referring to a sharpshooter or someone with startling accuracy and precision when handling a firearm.

He's a sniper.

> [{quoted}](name=NeoSeraphi,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iXTRtMpl,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2015-12-31T03:25:58.120+0000)

> 
> 2) Champions being pierced in very specific parts of their body
> 
> 3) Name is "Deadeye", referring to a sharpshooter or someone with startling accuracy and precision when handling a firearm.
> 
> He's a sniper.

hes actually a shoe cleaner, deadeye refers to his extreme shining precision, and the champs being pierced in specific parts had shoe shine on them.

1) That is not a gunshot, it's thunder (It could be a gunshot but it sounds to me like thunder)

2) Why would a sniper shoot at random places on a body, you don't shoot people through their neck because it won't kill them instantly

3) Name is "Jhin", referring to um Jhin?

Even if the champ is a sniper, probably not a normal sniper, something special, I mean why do the people have all these special effects flying out everywhere if they just got shot by cait.  Also, since there were two names there, 'Deadeye' is probably either a nickname for the champion or a title, I mean deadeye just doesn't sound like a riot name to me.   
Anyways, let's just both hope that it's not a sniper and if they are they are not a cait clone.

Just watched mind of the virtuoso, I was wrong :( sorry
Though the champ does look good, and I don't think that they are a sniper

TWIGGLES NO
3-4-5-vi is the order the videos are being posted

Some more interesting things to note:

The teaser pictures show them being pierced in certain symbolic locations.

Zed was pierced in the eye, for he was blinded by his lust for power.
Sona was pierced in the throat, for she could not voice her grief when the etwahl killed her adoptive mother.
Garen was pierced through the heart, for his heart was torn between duty for Demacia, and his feelings for Katarina.

Now we just have to wait for Vi's teaser.

> [{quoted}](name=Sailor Miku,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iXTRtMpl,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2015-12-31T08:03:50.156+0000)
>
> Garen was pierced through the heart, for his heart was torn between duty for Demacia, and his feelings for Katarina.

i've read their lores and no romance is mentioned between them.
i seen allegations like these with zac-riven and rengar-nidalee, but not reinforced by the lore. Unless there is a larger lore i missed.

No romance is explicitly mentioned in their lores; that would just make things too easy.  You just need to dig a little bit deeper.  Or have Tahm serve it on a platter.

Tahm Kench has a taunt for Garen and Katarina:
To Garen - "You live by a code that'll never let you get what you want.  Let me take you to her."
To Katarina - "Don't starve your heart, child!"  Let me deliver you to him."

It's heavily implied that Garen and Katarina have a thing for each other.  It's also worth mentioning that despite clashing viciously with each other, they leave each other alive in a stalemate; in normal circumstances, a Demacian would fight to the death against a Noxian, not let them live another day.
Illuminati Confirmed

3 letters in zed 3 corners in a triangle 1 eye in deadeye ILLUMINATI CONFIRMED

Jinx = jin + X. X = 10. 3 letters jin. 10-3=7. 7 letters in deadeye.

Jinx ultimate skin confirmed.

See how that works?

Garen + Sona + Vi + Zed

Add them all together, you can form the word Zedoaries.

What are Zedoaries? 

They're plants, flowers specifically. 

What's going through Zed's eye?

A flower. And in Vi's animated icon, petals, similar to those of the Zedoaria, can be seen.

This is probably way off but I tried to make a theory

{{champion:238}} Zed: The master of shadows has 17 letters in title
{{champion:254}} Vi: The piltover enforcer has 17 letters in title
{{champion:37}} Sona: Maven of the strings has 17 letters in title
{{champion:86}} Garen: The might of Demacia has 17 letters in title

Don't know what 17 has to do with Jhin.. 
But if Jhin's title has 17 letters in title this will complete my theory type thing..
I feel like the new champ is like... a magic gunslinger, or something of the sort. It feels appropriate given the context so far.
